stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  SO MANY PAPERS  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS
comments: Dr. Maurantonio is brilliant and nice to talk to. She is encouraging of student work and encourages us to get out into the great Richmond community for research and experience. Very active in working for students of disadvantaged backgrounds.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: She\'s nice and approachable, but also knows her stuff. The readings, screenings, and paper topics are interesting and good for both RHCS-majors and gen electives. Class is heavily discussion based, with her serving as a moderator/agenda setter, which occasionally gets repetitive. Not hard to succeed, but put in the work and you will learn as well.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
stu_tags: TOUGH GRADER  GROUP PROJECTS  GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK
comments: Had her for FYS Cops, Crime, and Popular Culture. It was a very interesting class. She is somewhat of a tough grader, but she provides great feedback and always welcomes you to her office. She gives 11 reading quizzes, but you are allowed to drop your lowest grade. There are no tests in the class and the longest paper is 4-5 pages.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: I had her for the FYS Cops, Crime, and Popular culture, and she is an amazing woman and teacher! Somewhat of a difficult grader, because she is in communication studies, but she is fair and gives every student and entire page full of critiques. She lets you rewrite papers as well. She is awesome and so interesting!! Hope i can take her again.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: I had her for my FYS, and I have to say, it was awesome! She was fun and energetic, and it was a very easy A. I would definitely take a class with her again.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: This class is definitely not the easy A it used to be. She revamped her course and now just arbitrarily gives out grades. The discussions are very circuitous and boring...difficult to stay awake. Pop quizzes once a week, one paper, blog posts throughout the semester, a midterm, and a cumulative final.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: A little bit frustrating. Asks discussion questions in class and instead of giving a response says "yeah, no, yeah, totally, definitely" Never fails. Pretty easy though, lectures can get boring.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Okay class, pretty easy. She\'s a nice person and seems to want everyone to do well. THe material is boring as ****, but she manages to liven it up w random youtube clips and whatnot. Sometimes her test questions were VERY ambiguous/not well phrased, which def cost people in my class points. Overall pretty decent teacher.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Um, I have no idea what that last guy was talking about, but I was in that class and I think that I know who wrote it. Hilarious! He\'s SO wrong. Prof. Maurantonio is AWESOME. She\'s smart, she\'s funny, and she knows what she\'s talking about. Yes, she\'s young, but that\'s cool. Take her class!

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: Shouldn\'t be teaching. She\'s fresh out of grad school and at some times was completely overmatched by intelligent students who don\'t agree with her. Her tests were confusing and she often made mistakes on them. Also she\'s very liberal and if you aren\'t completely to the left, make sure to censor your opinions.

tag_professor: Tough Grader (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Clear grading criteria (1)  GROUP PROJECTS (1)  Respected (1)  Amazing lectures (1)  Participation matters (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  SO MANY PAPERS (1)
comments: She is an amazing professor. She engages everyone in the class, making everyone feel as though their thoughts are valued and completely comfortable. She wants students to do well, so she is open to helping as much as needed. She also uses clips from SNL and the Daily Show.
